title: Smart Data Models - TurbLCFB1
description: Adapted from CIM data models. Turbine Load Controller model developed in the WECC.  This model represents a supervisory turbine load controller that acts to maintain turbine power at a set value by continuous adjustment of the turbine governor speed-load reference. This model is intended to represent slow reset 'outer loop' controllers managing the action of the turbine governor.

type.description: Property. NGSI type. It has to be TurbLCFB1

db.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Controller dead band (db).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

emax.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Maximum control error (Emax) (note 4).  Typical Value = 0.02. Default: 0.0

fb.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Frequency bias gain (Fb).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

fbf.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Frequency bias flag (Fbf). true = enable frequency bias false = disable frequency bias. Typical Value = false. Default: False

irmax.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Maximum turbine speed/load reference bias (Irmax) (note 3).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

ki.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Integral gain (Ki).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

kp.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Proportional gain (Kp).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

mwbase.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Base for power values (MWbase) (>0).  Unit = MW. Default: 0.0

pbf.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Power controller flag (Pbf). true = enable load controller false = disable load controller. Typical Value = false. Default: False

pmwset.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Power controller setpoint (Pmwset) (note 1).  Unit = MW. Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

speedReferenceGovernor.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Type of turbine governor reference (Type). true = speed reference governor false = load reference governor. Typical Value = true. Default: False

tpelec.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Power transducer time constant (Tpelec).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0
